t: Wire PO layer into go.md and execute-protocol

notes: Added PO Layer section between Analyze routing and Mode definitions. Config-gated (po.enabled), effort-gated (turbo skips), path-gated (trivial skips). Wires po-scope-loop.sh, render-user-presentation.sh, validate-deps.sh

Added Step 0: Product Ownership before Step 1 Critique. Entry gate: Analyze output or active milestone. Exit gate: scope-document.json with PO-APPROVED. Added po step to execution-state.json schema. Updated state transitions table
Added PO Layer Integration section documenting PO/Owner coexistence. Mode 0 deprecation notice when po.enabled=true. Owner retains Modes 1-4 unchanged
Made PO-Questionary-Roadmap handoff chain explicit in Planning Team section. Added backward compat note for po.enabled=false
Updated agent count to 29 with PO layer note. Added 3 key decisions for PO layer. Updated workflow description to 12-step when PO enabled
